ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering and raising skill level
ygData.msgSnippet: That means like most trades in EQ you WILL not make money selling to NPC in fact you won t even break even.  Follower of the Crimson Knights
ygData.messageBody:
That means like most trades in EQ you WILL not make money selling to NPC in
fact you won't even break even.


<-- Enigma -->
Follower of the Crimson Knights
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel McLarney [mailto:d-m@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 2:08 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com; EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Tinkering and raising skill level

From: Daniel McLarney <d-m@...>

I spent over 500pp in tinkering and not have seen my skill go up, I am
personally fed up with the GM's answerd, i got one today that they are
spending alot of time in develiopment to make tinkerd items work, however
they are not going to raise what the merchants already offer for them,
whatever that means.


At 03:32 PM 7/7/99 -0400, DBellassai@... wrote:
>From: DBellassai@...
>
>yes im having the same problem but i know the skill is inproving cause when
i
>go see my trainer it has the money symblols so it must be going up. I
>petion it to a gm and all he told me was that it should be improving and he
>didnt believe me that the skill is not imporving. He thought i was making
>trivial items. I havent tried since casue im tring to save money to put
>into the skill
